a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual research & development funding for infectious diseases, 2022

Global annual funding reported for research and development to address
neglected tropical diseases
(in blue).
These are compared to HIV/AIDS , tuberculosis , malaria , and COVID-19 (in orange). This data is expressed in US
Note: This data is expressed in constant 2022 US$. Despite high coverage, some R&D funding data may be missing, as not all funders
